Text, as in Textura.

To my knowledge, this has not been digitized. Or at least, there is no licensable version of it from any commercial foundry. (But I’m unaware of any free varieties either).
i love the caps, especially. i may model caps for “Adam” on these. in the mean time i guess what my next project to start will be… ;^D

Although there may not be a direct digital version of Caslon Text, I should point out that Cloister Black is a pretty close adaptation of Caslon Text, and there are a lot of digital versions of Cloister Black.

I have a slide or scan that compares the two, if that is of any help.

Regards,

T
